participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emma thrives on making others happy through her cooking and music.
participant_1.background: I love the feeling of a job well done, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people. I decided to write my own songs to challenge myself and to pursue my passion for music. My favorite band is The Beatles. I work hard and save money for my future. I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, Michael enjoys expressing himself through cooking and writing.
participant_2.background: My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings. I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib. I drive a black car. I am a great cook. I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.

content.text: I'm doing great! Thanks for asking!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a cook! I love to create delicious food for people.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I love the way the flavors of all the ingredients come together.
I love pasta too! What kind of pasta do you like to make?
I love making homemade pasta. It's so much fun to roll out the dough and cut it into different shapes.
That's awesome! I've never tried making homemade pasta.
You should! It's not as hard as you think. It's really rewarding to make your own pasta and see how much better it tastes than store-bought pasta.
I'll have to try it sometime. Thanks for the tip!
